articles.title: Nearly Half of TV Shoppers Want a TV Bigger Than 65 Inches - CNET
articles.description: CNET's survey found that, if money's no object, Americans crave huge screens.
articles.content:
If you want a gigantic TV, you're not alone. Huge TVs are getting less expensive and more popular every year, and our appetite for those massive screens is growing too.
A new survey by CNET and YouG… [+2440 chars]
